title: HPV Oral Cancer: Vaccines to the Rescue?
author: Sara I Pai; MD; PhD; Lidia Schapira
description: A near epidemic of HPV-related oral cancer is hitting a relatively young population. Can emerging therapies effectively manage the disease?
